price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߜߎ ߛߌߟߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߢߍ߫
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
